welcome_message_body: Welcome to Changshu, a charming city known for its beautiful canals, ancient gardens, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this vibrant city has to offer.

restaurants.name: KFC (肯德基)
restaurants.description: KFC (肯德基) is a fast food restaurant located in Changshu.
restaurants.address: 88 Haiyu S. Rd. (印象城店), Changshu, China, 215000

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Wuxi Airport with a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Wuxi Airport with modern facilities and a spacious waiting area.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to log in.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
